title: The Eleven-Hour Fall
description: What if you fell from a great height...toward a ground you couldn't see...and hours later you were still falling?For survival, for love--on a mysterious planet light years from home. With the man of her dreams unconscious in her arms, astronaut Kate Borrowdale must escape the treacherous peaks of Kratos and traverse a strange, hidden world beneath the clouds.
author: Robert Appleton
